name: Ghost Trotter
description:
"Ghost Trotter" is a Runner genre Video Game about a little ghost who must run away from the Sun and ends travelling around the world, having to endlessly escape the dawn at all cost.

Like in all Runner Video Games, our character, the little ghost, runs automatically towards the right, and the player must keep him away from the Sun, chasing him from behind, by jumping over or under sources of light in the night (such as lamposts or illuminated billbards)
He will attempt to travel around the world, across eight differents countries (France, Egypt, Russia, India, Japan, Hawai, USA and the UK).

This Video Game was conceived by three Game Designers (including me) and three Game Artists in two weeks with Adobe Animate. It was the first school project of 2nd semester of 1st year (3rd project in total).
